thread.title: BRIEF-Terravest Industries To Make A Substantial Issuer Bid For Its Shares And Debentures

title: BRIEF-Terravest Industries To Make A Substantial Issuer Bid For Its Shares And Debentures
text: March 16, 2018 / 1:19 PM / in 14 minutes BRIEF-Terravest Industries To Make A Substantial Issuer Bid For Its Shares And Debentures Reuters Staff March 16 (Reuters) - Terravest Industries Inc: * ANNOUNCES INTENTION TO MAKE A SUBSTANTIAL ISSUER BID FOR ITS SHARES AND DEBENTURES * INTENDS TO COMMENCE ISSUER BID PURSUANT TO WHICH CO TO OFFER TO BUY UP TO 1 MILLION OF OUTSTANDING COMMON SHARES AT $10/SHARE * OFFER WILL REMAIN OPEN FOR ACCEPTANCE UNTIL APRIL 26, 2018, UNLESS WITHDRAWN OR EXTENDED BY COMPANY Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
